name: Web scraping
tagline: A repo to store all my web scraping adventures
body:
### Data Science positions at Indeed job boards
Scraping indeed job boards for non-profit to test why every Australian employer advertise for data science unicorn ninjas with expert knowledge in data wrangling and 15 years of Hadoop programming skills while at the same time, requiring a Fields Medal in Applied Statistics. All of this will fetch the lucky candidate a grand total of $60,000. Something's broken in communication somewhere. Needs to be understood first.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
